about_the_game:
Astralith is a multiplayer wizard RPG where every character is truly your own. Collect dozens of spells and weapons, customize your character, and battle against other players to reach the peak of the Astralith.

  • Custom builds: Collect spells as you level up to create entirely new combos that make your character stand out.

  • Deep customization: Pick from several races as well as dozens of clothing items and weapons to make your character look unique.

  • Permadeath: Beware! Astralith takes death seriously. If your character dies, they're dead for good- but death also unlocks new spells for your next character!

  • Multiplayer: Astralith is hosted with a player cap of 100 per server, meaning you'll never be alone in your battle to the top.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
